translations: 钟面，仪表盘；调节器；（老式电话机的）拨号盘；<英，非正式>（人的）脸

phrs.translation: 转盘电话机；自动电话（等于dial phone）
表盘；标示板；指针板；拨号盘
英制千分表；度盘式指示器；刻度盘

sentences.sentence: I can't get a dial tone on this phone.
sentences.translation: 我在这部电话上听不到拨号音。

sentences.sentence: She picked up the receiver and started to dial.
Broadband is still more expensive than dial-up services.
sentences.translation: 宽带还是要比拨号服务费钱得多。
